references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe and Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..240 (first 50 terms from T. D. Noe)
mathematica: Tan[ x ]/Cosh[ x ] (* Odd Part *)nn = 20; Table[(CoefficientList[Series[Sech[x]*Tan[x], {x, 0, 2*nn+1}], x] * Range[0, 2*nn+1]!)[[n]], {n, 2, 2*nn, 2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 16 2015 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
